overview: In order to secretly replenish the family's failing fortunes, Virginia Griswold secures a position in the Secret Service to apprehend a group of counterfeiters and gain the reward money.
tagline: Sumptuous scenes in the palaces of Newport; fashion, romance, trickery, crime; finally a thrilling battle on a yacht in Newport harbor, and the girl and her mother and lover win!
title: Counterfeit
